title: Roasted aubergine and goat's cheese pasta

ingredients.item: 1 essential Waitrose Red Onion, cut into wedges
8 leaves fresh basil, shredded, plus a few whole leaves for garnishing
100g pack Moody’s Rosary Ash goat’s cheese

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220°C, gas mark 7. Arrange the aubergine and onion in a small roasting tin. Scatter over the chopped garlic, olive oil and shredded basil leaves. Season. Roast for 20–25 minutes, stirring once or twice until tender and charred.  Meanwhile, bring a large pan of water to the boil and cook the pasta for 8 minutes until tender. Drain and toss with the cooked vegetables, goat’s cheese, pine nuts and seasoning. Garnish with basil leaves and serve with a green salad.
